titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives with regard to Project Exile and the prosecution of Federal firearms offenses.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime.

bill.summary: 6/10/1999--Introduced. Expresses the sense of Congress that the House of Representatives fully supports Project Exile, as it results in the arrest and punishment of armed criminals through absolute prosecution and imprisonment under existing law. Urges the Department of Justice to prosecute all criminal violations of Federal firearms laws.
